name: Conditional order refused (ammended)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name)),

Your application for a conditional order has been reviewed. You need to change (amend) your application before it can continue. You will receive a letter in the post, and a copy of your application to update and send back to the court. 

You can view the court's feedback and download a copy of your refusal order in your online account: ((signin url))

You have to update a paper copy of the application though. 

((husbandJoint??Either you or your husband can update the application.))((wifeJoint??Either you or your wife can update the application.))((civilPartnerJoint??Either you or your civil partner can update the application.))((joint conditional order?? You should agree the information first. They have also been sent this email.))

Divorce and Dissolution 
HM Courts & Tribunals Service 
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm) 

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: Action required: your application ((isDivorce??for divorce))((isDissolution??to end your civil partnership))
